items.title: As the Nintendo eShop fails to protect from 'eslop', indie devs reflect on how it affects their work and why Steam is just better: 'Their algorithm will more or less naturally bury AI slop'
items.summary: The Nintendo eShop's failure to protect from 'eslop' has indie devs concerned about the impact on their work, as they believe Steam's algorithm handles AI slop better by burying it in a list of releases.

items.title: Google inks $3bn US hydropower deal in largest clean energy agreement of its kind
items.summary: Google has signed a $3 billion deal to purchase 3GW of US hydropower, aiming to power its AI and data centers in the eastern states.

items.summary: Free AI training will be provided to 5.5 lakh village entrepreneurs by the government under the IndiaAI Mission, with the goal of skilling 10 lakh individuals. The initiative focuses on village-level entrepreneurs who offer essential digital services.

items.summary: More than 270,000 people in three states were warned to stay out of Lake Superior's waters due to dangerous conditions, with the warning being generated by an AI voice. National Weather Service lead meteorologist mentioned the inconsistencies that may occur with AI-generated messages.
